languages.text: "Молчи, ведьма. Ты не знаешь, как раскаяние может снедать человека и что истинно верующие сами выбирают для себя наказание".

traits.locale_text: "Молчи, ведьма. Ты не знаешь, как раскаяние может снедать человека, и что истинно верующие сами выбирают для себя наказание".

languages.text: "Be silent, witch. You know not how bitterly remorse may haunt someone, or how those who truly believe always choose their own punishment."
languages.original_text: "Молчи, ведьма. Ты не знаешь, как раскаяние может снедать человека и что истинно верующие сами выбирают для себя наказание".

traits.locale_text: "Be silent, witch. You know not how bitterly remorse may haunt someone, or how those who truly believe always choose their own punishment."
"Be silent, witch. You know not how bitterly remorse may haunt someone, or how those who truly believe always choose their own punishment."
"Be silent, witch. You know not how bitterly remorse may haunt someone, or how those who truly believe always choose their own punishment."
"Be silent, witch. You know not how bitterly remorse may haunt someone, or how those who truly believe always choose their own punishment."
"Be silent, witch. You know not how bitterly remorse may haunt someone, or how those who truly believe always choose their own punishment."
"Be silent, witch. You know not how bitterly remorse may haunt someone, or how those who truly believe always choose their own punishment."

languages.text: 「黙れ、魔女。お前にはわからないだろう。悔恨がどれほど苦しく人を苛むかも、真に信じる者がいかにして自ら罰を選ぶかも」
languages.original_text: "Be silent, witch. You know not how bitterly remorse may haunt someone, or how those who truly believe always choose their own punishment."

traits.locale_text: 「黙れ、魔女。お前にはわからないだろう。悔恨がどれほど苦しく人を苛むかも、真に信じる者がいかにして自ら罰を選ぶかも」

languages.text: "Schweigt, Hexe. Ihr wisst nicht, wie bitter die Reue einen plagen kann oder wie jene, die wirklich gläubig sind, sich ihre Strafe immer selbst auferlegen."
languages.original_text: "Be silent, witch. You know not how bitterly remorse may haunt someone, or how those who truly believe always choose their own punishment."

traits.locale_text: "Schweigt, Hexe. Ihr wisst nicht, wie bitter die Reue einen plagen kann oder wie jene, die wirklich gläubig sind, sich ihre Strafe immer selbst auferlegen."

languages.text: « Silence, sorcière. Vous ne connaissez pas le poids écrasant du remords et ignorez que ceux qui ont réellement la foi s'infligent toujours leur propre punition. »
languages.original_text: "Be silent, witch. You know not how bitterly remorse may haunt someone, or how those who truly believe always choose their own punishment."

traits.locale_text: « Silence, sorcière. Vous ne connaissez pas le poids écrasant du remords et ignorez que ceux qui ont réellement la foi s'infligent toujours leur propre punition. »

languages.text: «Guarda silencio, bruja. Ignoras lo amargo que puede ser el resentimiento, o cómo los verdaderos creyentes siempre deciden su propio castigo».
languages.original_text: "Be silent, witch. You know not how bitterly remorse may haunt someone, or how those who truly believe always choose their own punishment."

traits.locale_text: «Guarda silencio, bruja. Ignoras lo amargo que puede ser el resentimiento, o cómo los verdaderos creyentes siempre deciden su propio castigo».

languages.text: “闭嘴吧，女巫。你根本不明白悔恨会让人多么痛苦，也不明白那些真正心怀信仰的人，会甘愿接受自己的惩罚。”
languages.original_text: "Be silent, witch. You know not how bitterly remorse may haunt someone, or how those who truly believe always choose their own punishment."

traits.locale_text: “闭嘴吧，女巫。你根本不明白悔恨会让人多么痛苦，也不明白那些真正心怀信仰的人，会甘愿接受自己的惩罚。”

languages.text: "Sus cadı. Peşini bırakmayan vicdan azabı illetini, kendi cezalarını kendileri kesen imanlıların yaşadıklarını nereden bileceksin?"
languages.original_text: "Be silent, witch. You know not how bitterly remorse may haunt someone, or how those who truly believe always choose their own punishment."

languages.original_text: "Be silent, witch. You know not how bitterly remorse may haunt someone, or how those who truly believe always choose their own punishment."
